law.text: No licensee conducting a race or meet hereunder, no member of the racing commission, judge, or assistant official appointed to act as such pursuant to this chapter, shall be liable for damages to any person, association, or corporation for any cause whatsoever arising out of or from the performance by the licensee, member of the racing commission, judge, or assistant official of his duties and the exercise of his discretion with respect thereto, so long as he acted in good faith, without malice or improper motive.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 486, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 35, effective March 30, 1992. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 16.
